content.text: The elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period (June 10-12, 2025). On June 10, there were 25 new PRs (with 23 merged), 1 new issue, and 13 active contributors. The following day (June 11) saw 19 new PRs (with 8 merged), 1 new issue, and 10 active contributors. Overall, this indicates a consistently active project with substantial developer engagement, maintaining a steady flow of contributions and issue management.
PR #5051 by @ChristopherTrimboli titled 'chore: v1.0.8' is merged.
PR #5046 by @madjin titled 'chore: Update docs' is open.
PR #5036 by @wtfsayo titled 'refactor: reorganize cli commands into modular structure' is merged.
PR #4968 titled 'fix: implement real-time message deletion via SocketIO' is merged.
PR #5020 titled 'feat: refactor / split core types' is merged.
PR #5018 titled 'feat: Dynamic loading of database tables, rebuild plugin-sql' is merged.
PR #5016 titled 'feat: migrate CLI prompts from prompts library to @clack/prompts' is merged.
PR #5010 titled 'feat: Reorganize API routes into logical domain-based structure' is merged.
PR #5048 titled 'fix: load the env config before agent project is loaded' is merged.
PR #5047 titled 'chore: add comprehensive Postman collection for elizaOS APIs' is merged.
PR #5044 titled 'Fix: Enable loading project agents when no character files specified' is merged.
PR #5043 titled 'chore: migrate all generated files into .eliza' is merged.
PR #5042 titled 'chore: OpenTelemetry instrumentation while preserving Sentry' is merged.
PR #5041 titled 'fix: (cli) resolve double update messaging and improve elizaos update instructions' is merged.
PR #5038 titled 'chore: remove model caching since its slower' is merged.
PR #5035 titled 'fix: remove message from chat UI on delete' is merged.
PR #5034 titled 'fix: chat history selector reloads' is merged.
PR #5033 titled 'fix: onboarding user settings error' is merged.
PR #5032 titled 'fix: convert dates, fix agent create' is merged.
PR #5031 titled 'chore: fix typos' is merged.
PR #5030 titled 'feat: add dummy services' is merged.
PR #5028 titled 'fix: remove truncate' is merged.
PR #5027 titled 'fix: Ensure waitForServer uses SERVER_PORT env if provided' is merged.
PR #5026 titled 'feat: Add target to Content' is merged.
PR #5049 titled 'fix: dup chats' is merged.
PR #5066 by @samarth30 titled 'feat: updated plugin migrator' is open.
PR #5057 by @alex-nax titled 'Updated agent to use eliza v1.x' is open.
PR #5061 by @wtfsayo titled 'feat: consolidate shared utils in cli commands' is open.
PR #5050 by @0xbbjoker titled 'fix: update prompt, change actions logic, adjust for responses instead' is merged.
PR #5045 titled 'fix(plugin-sql): use correct agentId from memory in database operations' is merged.
PR #5068 titled 'Revert "feat: update prompt, change actions logic, adjust for responses"' is merged.
PR #5065 titled 'chore: remove mock test from cli package' is merged.
PR #5062 titled 'fix: api routes' is merged.
PR #5059 titled 'chore: Update README with comprehensive CLI documentation' is merged.
PR #5054 titled 'fix: fix `bun run dev`' is merged.
Issue #5039 titled 'Unable to load custom characters after upgrading to 1.0.7' by @jonathanprozzi is CLOSED after receiving 5 comments over a one-day period.
Issue #5023 titled 'GPT-4o access error with OpenAI API key' by @ceeriil is CLOSED with 5 comments addressing API authentication problems.
Issue #5060 titled 'Add optional Stream responses to handle streaming' by @SyedMuqeetAqib is OPEN with 1 comment suggesting a feature enhancement for response handling.
Issue #4929 titled 'inactive agent shown as active in sidebar' by @wtfsayo is CLOSED with no comments, addressing a UI display inconsistency.

categories.title: Crypto Market Data from codexAnalytics
content: WETH price increased from $2,680.39 to $2,814.15, showing a positive trend in Ethereum's wrapped token.
SOL (Solana) price rose from $161.15 to $165.08, indicating upward movement in this cryptocurrency.
WBTC (Wrapped Bitcoin) showed a slight decrease from $110,252.31 to $110,239.89, remaining relatively stable at a high valuation.
The ai16z token decreased in value from $0.25 to $0.24, showing a minor downward trend for this smaller cryptocurrency.
